name: Zuppa di fagioli alla menta
desc: A rich soup made with simple ingredients. Mints and beans were boiled and ground together to get a smooth texture. The soup was then left on low heat till it thickened. Finally, some beans and mints were sprinkled on the top. This refreshing delicacy tastes equally good whether served hot or cold.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 100 HP.

value.name: Ricetta: zuppa di fagioli alla menta
value.desc: Una ricetta passo dopo passo per preparare della zuppa di fagioli alla menta.

value.name: Fagioli glabri
value.desc: A common legume in Teyvat with a light aroma. It can be prepared in a variety of ways, and is thus widely accepted by people all over the world.

value.name: Menta
value.desc: Un ingrediente rinfrescante che pu√≤ mitigare la piccantezza di molti piatti.

value.name: Zuppa di fagioli alla menta deliziosa
value.desc: A rich soup made with simple ingredients. The smooth texture caresses your taste buds, filling your mouth with the refreshing scent of beans and mints. The unadorned yet pleasant flavor reminds you of a leisurely walk in the shade. Who can refuse such simple delight?

value.name: Zuppa di fagioli alla menta sospetta
value.desc: A rich soup made with simple ingredients. Due to an excess of water, the soup tastes more like a beverage than a proper dish. Why not add some ice and turn it into a bowl of Minty Bean Water, then?
